price: ‹ ߣߎߤߎ߲߫ › ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒߠߋ ߟߐ߲ߕߊ ߦߋ߫ ߡߎ߲߬ ߘߌ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߯ߙߊ߫ ߞߍߣߍ߲ ߘߐ߫؟
arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلۡمِي بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla wamā ʿil'mī bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
